content.raw:
I'm not sure I like how the header files are installed. For ignition-math 1.x, the headers are installed to `ignition/math/*` and also `ignition/math.hh`:
~~~
/usr/include/ignition/math/Quaternion.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math.hh
~~~

This pull request changes it to use:
~~~
/usr/include/ignition/math2/Quaternion.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math2.hh
~~~

The include folder supplied by pkg-config and cmake is then changed so that users should include `Quaternion.hh` instead of `ignition/math/Quaternion.hh`. I think it's responsible to namespace our header files, so this seems like a step back to me.

I like how gazebo and sdformat do header files right now by installing to a versioned subfolder of the include folder.
~~~
/usr/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/sdf.hh
/usr/include/sdformat-3.0/sdf/parser.hh
~~~
